mapper.select: SELECT WORKPLACE_CODE as workplaceCode, COMPANY_CODE as companyCode, WORKPLACE_NAME as workplaceName, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NUMBER as businessLicense, CORPORATION_LICENSE_NUMBER as corporationLicence, WORKPLACE_CEO_NAME as workplaceCeoName, WORKPLACE_BUSINESS_CONDITIONS as businessConditions, WORKPLACE_BUSINESS_ITEMS as businessItems, WORKPLACE_TEL_NUMBER as workplaceTelNumber, WORKPLACE_FAX_NUMBER as workplaceFaxNumber, WORKPLACE_BASIC_ADDRESS as workplaceBasicAddress, APPROVAL_STATUS as approvalStatus, FROM WORKPLACE WHERE WORKPLACE_CODE= #{workplaceCode}
